name: letterfeed
description: LetterFeed is a simple self-hosted platform for publishing newsletters. It offers a minimal editor and public feed, allowing individuals or teams to manage newsletters without relying on third-party services.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Simple editor, Public feed, Subscriber management. Publish newsletters independently

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: No third-party services, Full control, Privacy-focused. Own your newsletter platform

features.title: Subscriber Management
features.description: Email lists, Subscription forms, Unsubscribe handling. Manage your audience

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Rich text editing, Markdown support, Preview mode. Create beautiful newsletters

features.title: Email Delivery
features.description: SMTP integration, Bulk sending, Delivery tracking. Reach subscribers reliably

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Open rates, Subscriber growth, Engagement metrics. Understand your audience
